mapper.update:
update platform
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reference_interest_rate = #{referenceInterestRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reference_day = #{referenceDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loan_money_low = #{loanMoneyLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loan_money_high = #{loanMoneyHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loan_cycle_low = #{loanCycleLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loan_cycle_high = #{loanCycleHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from platform_browsing_history
(plaid = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} or planame = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and browsing_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= browsing_time
and userid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by browsing_time desc
SELECT FROM platform ORDER BY displayposition ASC
